title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1103.13 - Distance learning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1103.13 - Distance learning

State Regulations

Distance learning
is defined as any
educational process based on the geographical separation of instructor and
student. Educational providers who wish to offer distance learning programs
must have their programs evaluated and approved in accordance with sections
1103.14, 1103.15 and
1103.16. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

ยง

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
